1010100011111111 1101111111101101 1 -> sum: 1000100011101101, cout: 1

0100010010001110 0101001000110110 0 -> sum: 1001011011000100, cout: 0
1111001111011010 0100100111101101 0 -> sum: 0011110111000111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
